description:
The complete bundle for cooking and charging in the outdoors. This kit includes the BioLite CampStove 2+ and it's cooking accessories to open up more menu options in the outdoors. The CampStove2+ burns twigs, pinecones, wood pellets, and other biomass while generating electricity to keep your USB-powered devices charged.

  • LED dashboard lets you know the status of the fire, fan, and battery
  • Made of stainless steel, aluminum and plastic
  • Maximum continuous power output for USB is 3W at 5V. Peak is 3W at 5V (2A)
  • Charging times vary depending on the device and fire strength
  • Ports: micro-USB female (charging), type-A USB female (discharging)
  • 3200mAh battery requires initial charging via USB and recharging if the stove is not used for 6 months
  • Pot weight limit is 9kg
  • KettlePot holds 1.5L
  • Grill has 355 square cm. of cooking area
  • Includes CampStove 2+, FlexLight 100, KettlePot, portable grill, stuff sack, instructions. USB cables for individual devices not included
name: BioLite CampStove Complete Kit
